ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 17 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 5D Mark III Digital SLR Camera with EF 24-105mm L IS USM Lens + <2> Canon 70-200mm f2.8L ISII Lens + <3> Canon 200DG DSLR Camera Case + <4> Canon 62-inch Deluxe Tripod +
<5> Canon Optical Cleaning Kit + <6> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <7> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <8> Battery Charger for LP-E6 +
<9> Battery Grip for Canon 5D + <10> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <11> 77mm UV Filter + <12> Additional 77mm UV Filter +
<13> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <14> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <15> PD Deluxe Hurricane Blower + <16> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <17> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 5D Mark III Digital SLR Camera with EF 24-105mm L IS & 70-200mm f/2.8 L IS II Lens + 64GB Card + Grip + Battery & Charger + Case + Tripod + Kit
